borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a new two storey two bedroom dwelling

constraints_details.result: 1 Sheppey Road, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM9 4LJ
